info.description: Various commands for debugging hardware (Flipper). Available only after emulation has been started.

ramload.help: Load binary file to main memory
usage:
Syntax: ramload <file> <address>
Example of use: ramload lomem.bin 0x80000000

ramsave.help: Save main memory content to file
usage:
Syntax: ramsave <file> <address> <size>
Example of use: ramsave lomem.bin 0x80000000 0x3300

Syntax: aramload <file> <address>
Example of use: aramload samples.bin 0x10000

Syntax: aramsave <file> <address> <size>
Example of use: aramsave samples.bin 0x10000 0x200
